com.mumfrey.liteloader.interfaces

Interface PanelManager<TParentScreen>

  • Type Parameters:
    TParentScreen - GuiScreen class, must be generic because we don't have GuiScreen on the server side
    All Superinterfaces:
    Observer, PostRenderObserver, TickObserver
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LiteLoaderPanelManager

    public interface PanelManager<TParentScreen>
extends TickObserver, PostRenderObserver
    Interface for the liteloader panel manager, abstracted because we don't have the class GuiScreen on the server.
    Author:
    Adam Mummery-Smith
